rules_text:
[i](As a Siege enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When it's defeated, exile it, then cast it transformed.)[/i]
When The Battle of Kamino enters, return target artifact or creature to its owner's hand.
rules_text2: {3}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Copy target creature spell you control.
flavor_text2: [i]“We must stop the production of new clones if we are to win this war.”[/i]
